title: 2022 Roundup of Web Research
description: Reports are released throughout the year by a bunch of different companies and organizations researching everything from web design trends to developer skills to popular coding languages and so many other things.

title: Are Javascript Redirects SEO Friendly?
description: Learn about the basics of JavaScript redirects and their implications for SEO, along with how to implement them and common mistakes to avoid.

title: C++ 23 standard won’t have a key parallelism feature
CSS Style Queries
description: Recently, the Chrome team released experimental support for a new proposed CSS spec, style queries. In short, they let us query the style of a container, rather than the size only.

title: Danish physicists give the gift of world’s smallest Christmas record—in stereo
Deploying CSS Logical Properties On Web Apps
description: To help raise your awareness of their possibilities, Nicolas Hoffmann shares his experience of how he and his team at Proton carried out a massive move from CSS logical props to production and how you can consider them from a different perspective in your very own projects.

title: Donald Knuth’s 2022 ‘Christmas Tree’ lecture is about trees
description: "I think that I shall never see a poem lovely as a tree."

title: LastPass users: Your info and password vault data are now in hackers’ hands
description: So, they're the last place you want to save your passwords?

title: Patch now: Serious Linux kernel security hole uncovered
description: It's The Year of Linux hacking!

title: The Best Practices for Front-End Development
description: Ensuring that your front-end code is optimized, maintainable, and follows industry standards is essential for creating a seamless user experience.

title: The cargo cult of good code
description: One day, John Frum will fix all our code

title: You can now make Windows 11 look like Windows 95. Here's how.
description: In case you need something to start you up
